summary: Implements a MeshGrpc class that connects to the MAPDL gRPC server, streams the finiteâ€‘element mesh (nodes, elements, etc.) in chunked form, parses the binary data into NumPy arrays, and manages temporary storage for further processing.
business_intent: Enable automated retrieval and conversion of FEM mesh data from a remote ANSYS MAPDL instance via gRPC, facilitating downstream analysis or visualization without manual file handling.
